newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Oppenheimer starts six companies. [CORRECTED 17:50 GMT]
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Oppenheimer starts six companies. [CORRECTED 17:50 GMT]

text.p: -- Oppenheimer & Co has started coverage of six companies, most of them health care management information firms, a trading source said on Tuesday.
-- Five of the six companies got buy ratings.
-- Shared Medical Systems Corp, a medical data management company, was rated market perform.
-- Oppenheimer rated IMNET Systems a buy. (Corrects company name from Intermet Corp.)
-- Medic Computer System Inc, a health care information services company, was rated a buy.
-- Oppenheimer started Phamis Inc with a buy rating.
-- Sunquest Information Inc was rated a buy.
-- HBO & Co was rated a buy, the source said.
